thread.title: Conservative Group Heritage Action Still Against Republican Health Care Bill
thread.title_full: Conservative Group Heritage Action Still Against Republican Health Care Bill

author: Matt Shuham
title: Conservative Group Heritage Action Still Against Republican Health Care Bill

organizations.name: conservative group heritage action still against republican health care bill

text:
The CEO of Heritage Action for America, a conservative think tank, announced Tuesday that the group would continue to oppose the White House’s preferred plan to replace Obamacare.
Read More →
